synthesis_method: The synthesis process involves adjusting the molar ratios of lithium sulfide (Li2S), diphosphorus pentasulfide (P2S5), and a halogen-containing compound, mixing the raw materials, pelletizing them, heating in a carbon-coated quartz tube at a specified temperature (400°C to 1000°C) for a set duration (0.1 to 12 hours), and finally obtaining the solid electrolyte by quenching or rapid cooling.
